urls.title: UPDATE 2: LATAM AIRLINES PERU FLIGHT LA 2213

data.text: We inform you that after the reopening of the Lima International Airport, the LATAM Group will now resume its operations. We recommend passengers to check the status of their flight on https://t.co/Gm0DtSGsS8. Click here for more information: https://t.co/Ik3HMwuqqQ

urls.title: UPDATE 5: LATAM GROUP REPORTS ON ITS OPERATIONS AT LIMA INTERNATIONAL AIRPORT

data.text: -NEW INFORMATION- We have issued another statement with more information about the situation at Lima’s International Airport: https://t.co/3YZwW4urBe

urls.title: UPDATE 4: LATAM Airlines Peru flight LA 2213

data.text: -NEW INFORMATION- We have issued a statement with more information about the situation at Lima’s Jorge Chávez International Airport: https://t.co/Qf5xJtJgLU
We inform that the incident in Lima has caused a high volume of calls to our Call Center. We recommend you to visit our site and make the changes directly in My Trips section.

data.text: Open your window to the world, leaving on the ground all the 'but' that limit you and change them to the 'why not?' that make you fly high. ✈️🌎 Find out more https://t.co/wXkKHPSwSJ https://t.co/cm1715q7dy

urls.title: Empathy Seat.
urls.description: Empathy is our ability to identify ourselves with someone and share their feelings.❤ During this Pride Month, we invite everyone to live this experience in ...

data.text:
It’s today, it’s today! ❤️ On LGBTQIA+ Pride Day, we would like to share with everyone the best moments of the Empathy Seat. It’s an unforgettable experience to feel identified with the stories on our Spotify Playlist. We invite you to listen to them! https://t.co/2cgcUYlBTS
🏳️‍🌈 https://t.co/SCtntRZeFf

Empathy is the ability to identify ourselves with someone and share their feelings. During Pride Month, we invite you to live this experience through our Empathy Seat. Get to know these 5 moving stories from the LGBTQIA+🏳️‍🌈 community #WeOnlyLabelLuggage https://t.co/SevnQKfLFf

Sit down, fasten your seat belt and make yourself comfortable!
On this Pride Month, an experience that will make everyone live empathy in an unprecedented way is coming soon 🌈 Get ready!
#WeOnlyLabelLuggage 💖 https://t.co/H55k6mTukM
Among them are: Completed Certificate of Vaccination, Travel Declaration Form, and Follow-up Contact Record. For more details, visit "Requirements for your trip" at https://t.co/pxuBw9jPIv (2/2)

We are working to improve your future experience!
Between May 17 and 23, our LATAM Pass platform will be undergoing improvements, so some services will not be available. More details here: https://t.co/CInMDjS0qm ✈😉. https://t.co/RbuFShj2BN

entity.name: It's Mother's Day
entity.description: The following Tweets are part of a live conversation detected by an algorithm.

data.text: Going back to mom is traveling to your origin, because they are our roots and the heart of our homes. These strong women raised us flying over all frontiers and gave us wings to fly without leaving aside their tenderness, love and affection. Have a happy Mother's Day, Mom!💞 https://t.co/PVe88NWSif

Going back to mom is traveling to your origin, because they are our roots and the heart of our homes. This week is dedicated to the moms, and we want to thank them because they made us become the best version of ourselves through their love and affection. Have a happy day, Mom!💞 https://t.co/iXpaw17dWz

Scams never look like scams! 🙂😈  We will never contact you through channels other than the official ones to recover personal belongings or change a ticket. https://t.co/J07iR2JyMf https://t.co/mJUYzWF68k

urls.title: Travel requirements | LATAM Airlines
urls.description: Know the restrictions to travel inside and outside of United States.

data.text: That's why we count on your support to follow the health regulations required by each country. Find out more information about government restrictions on our site: https://t.co/jbAvwePhAm (2/2)

#AttentionPassengers: despite the recent measures published by the United States government on the optional use of masks at its airports, the authorities of Brazil, Chile, Colombia and Peru require their use inside our aircraft. (1/2) https://t.co/fV900khNjs

More than 4.3 million refugees from Ukraine have been forced to flee their homes, and @ACNURamericas supports those who need it most. We wanted to be part of this effort, and through a partnership with UNHCR, we will contribute #WithRefugees by bringing humanitarian aid for free. https://t.co/MdfiBBnOB6

urls.description: Know the restrictions to travel inside and outside of United States.

data.text: Planning your next trip? We invite you to review our interactive map to know the health restrictions you must consider when traveling. ✈️Get to know them here: https://t.co/J4MCg59xE3 https://t.co/dmZvApal6W
The world is full of women who, despite prejudices, fly over frontiers to shorten distances and achieve their dreams 🙋🏻‍♀️✨ #WeTouchTheClouds https://t.co/7OwMtfeRri

We continue digitalizing the world's airports. The Express bag drop arrived at Miami International Airport 😱! From now on, you can dispatch your baggage yourself with fewer lines and quickly, safely and autonomously 😄. Learn more at https://t.co/tHlp20GwO1 ✈️. https://t.co/msfrzgqcl0

Let’s go on a tour without frontiers through San Pedro de Atacama, Pipa, Cusco, Cartagena, and Galápagos with our safety video✈️! Get to know the onboard safety instructions while visiting the best of South America. #LATAMSafetyVideo 🎬 Watch it at https://t.co/giavWrsKHA https://t.co/YjP6ACxqXn

We're almost there 😄! Soon you will learn more about San Pedro de Atacama, Pipa, Cartagena, Galapagos, and Cusco, along with our safety video 🎬. Watch it on February 7th on our LATAM Airlines channels and be amazed at the fantastic spots in our region ❤️. #LATAMSafetyVideo ✈️ https://t.co/l3nHlCA0un

data.text: #AttentionPassengers: Due to the flight cancellations that have occurred this month, we invite you to follow the recommendations given by Amalia Quiroz, Head of Contingency Customer Care. Get to know your reservation options at https://t.co/8mELGOdjk6 https://t.co/737Gg8L6Yd

urls.title: More flexibility to travel | LATAM Airlines
urls.description: Check out the flexible purchase options we have for your next trip.

data.text: #AttentionPassengers: Along with Rafael Walker, LATAM’s Customer Care Director, we kindly ask you to follow these recommendations if your trip has been affected by flight cancellations. Check out your options at https://t.co/v7eCZL04Bi https://t.co/LWCzwL0Ml3

One more step towards inclusivity! At LATAM Airlines we want everyone to be able to fly, which is why we have started a certification process to assist passengers on the autism spectrum. Giving wings to inclusivity. #WhatMakesUsFly https://t.co/ZbEAoFAPuJ https://t.co/aa496A9hk7
Arrive earlier at your boarding gate, since immigration and security control times and processes are presenting high waiting times.  More information at https://t.co/OXUH9LR2xp. (4/4)

entity.name: 🎂27日は内田真礼さんの誕生日

data.text: There is another gift to share! 🎁 At the end of this year, let’s shorten the distances and meet our favorite people again✈️ celebrating together to start a new year with the people we love ✨❤️ Reconnecting #AGiftThatMakesUsFly https://t.co/FENDf7NeA8

As this year ends, we have thousands of reasons to be with the people we love ❤🎄.  Because gathering, hugging, laughing, and sharing special moments are the gifts that make us fly 🛫✨. https://t.co/Quav81rBMi

You will live a fantastic adventure when visiting this paradisiac spot in the north of Brazil. Jericoacoara’s beautiful warm beaches, white sands, and breathtaking sunsets are waiting to fascinate you. Are you ready for this new LATAM route? ✈ https://t.co/HZm4lAtbHo

annotations.normalized_text: Global Traveler GT Tested Reader Survey Awards

data.text:
Let’s celebrate together the Four Star Global Airline 2022 qualification in the Official Airline Ratings, awarded by @theAPEXassoc, and the recognition as the “Best Airline in South America” given by the Global Traveler GT Tested Reader Survey Awards.
https://t.co/OCJl1nApMF https://t.co/7qRF0i3nxB
#AttentionPassengers. We are experiencing some technical difficulties with incoming calls to our Contact Center. To save time, please go to https://t.co/x1X3UC34NV Thanks for your understanding.
We remind you to use the same document number (passport/identity card) to apply for the vaccine validation and fill out the C19 form. Find out more information at https://t.co/OXUH9LR2xp (2/2)

data.text: #AttentionPassengers: Please remember that non-resident foreigners, independent of their age, can only enter Chile if their vaccination scheme is validated (Mobility Pass) in addition to all other entry requirements (negative PCR, health insurance, and C19). (1/2)👇 https://t.co/Oz0qdUe7rn

These passengers must comply with the measures already in force: PCR test performed 72 hours before the flight to Argentina as well as Argentina's Health Affidavit. More information at https://t.co/OXUH9LR2xp

#AttentionPassengers: As of November 1st, non-resident foreign tourists who have completed their vaccination scheme will also be able to enter Argentina, regardless of their place of origin, without needing to quarantine. https://t.co/0xrdrmjGp3

domain.name: Reoccurring Trends

data.text: During Pink October, we continue giving wings to Tattoo Truck Tour 💪💕 by taking its art to Lima, Peru, and inspire more women who underwent a mastectomy to feel empowered in their bodies again. Learn all about this new story! #SelfEsteemDestination 💖 https://t.co/OoIIp2kjXK

domain.name: Interests and Hobbies
domain.description: Interests, opinions, and behaviors of individuals, groups, or cultures; like Speciality Cooking or Theme Parks

data.text: In October, we celebrate the work done by Tattoo Truck Tour, making their unique art fly to more destinations in the region. 💪💕 We want to share with you the story of these strong women from São Paulo, Brazil, who spread their wings to reach a #SelfEsteemDestination🎗💖 https://t.co/dinBMCi8po

We reinforce our commitment to the planet by working with the @fcataruben and @pantheracats on the CO2BIO project. This sustainable initiative seeks to develop social, environmental and economic co-benefits through natural solutions. To be more sustainable is #WhatMakesUsFly https://t.co/AE3QnohzBd

Purchasing your trip at LATAM is much easier now! Enjoy this new digital experience by going to https://t.co/pxuBw92ejV. Then, you'll have access to customized notifications, more means of payment, automatic Check-in, and more. We want to connect you faster with #WhatMakesYouFly https://t.co/MFaXrY5sxo

¡Vuelve a encantarte con uno de tus destinos favoritos! Perú te está esperando para que vuelvas a disfrutar de su gastronomía y paisajes de ensueño. Conoce las principales restricciones y documentos necesarios para viajar en: https://t.co/y8MWIiBUuW https://t.co/izDAWBzJFG

entity.name: Travel Actions
entity.description: This entity includes all conversations about travel and vacation.

data.text: You can enjoy one of your favorite destinations again! Peru is waiting for you so you can enjoy its unique gastronomy and dream landscapes again. Get to know the main restrictions and documents necessary to travel at: https://t.co/V1LC521G33 https://t.co/cNR6CDDe5l

domain.name: Reoccurring Trends
domain.description: Twitter generated Trends that occur on a daily, weekly, monthly, or yearly basis such as Monday motivation.

data.text: Our global leader for diversity and inclusion, Marta, joined us in #PinkOctober to bring more hope and self-esteem to South America and the world. 🎗💖 Together, we will also carry out a very special project to fly higher. 💪💕 See the message we prepared! #SelfEsteemDestination https://t.co/hLWtyEOirW

We want to support and inspire women to recover confidence in their bodies to continue feeling empowered and beautiful so that we can reach together Self-Esteem Destination 💪💕. We also want to reinforce the importance of the self-exam for breast cancer early detection. 🎗💖 https://t.co/DNuO1GbX5z

Today we were recognized as the “Best Airline in South America” by the Skytrax World Airline Awards. This acknowledgment makes us very proud because this honor was given by our own passengers. Learn more: https://t.co/CgIkP6P3H1 https://t.co/Ls91pQG9TG

data.text: We will add 28 A320Neo aircraft to our fleet soon, completing a total order for 70 aircraft from the Airbus family. Their technology and efficiency allow us to become more eco-friendly and reach a more sustainable future. #WhatMakesUsFly https://t.co/MM3ZNNdTyq https://t.co/rwwSY9uNk7

data.text: Such pride to be able to tell the world that Marta Vieira da Silva is now flying with us. Marta is our new Global Diversity and Inclusion Leader to strengthen these pillars and build together an increasingly plural group. Having an icon on board is #WhatMakesUsFly #MartaWithLATAM https://t.co/oMq8G84kv4

data.text: We want to keep you informed about the mandatory requirements to travel. You must check the details of entry, departure, and connections for each destination. Learn about the most important steps in this #ChecklistLATAM and get to know the details at https://t.co/OXUH9LR2xp https://t.co/KAhmhHEnlN

We know that the closure of the Chilean borders may change your plans, so remember that if your flight is scheduled between July 1st and 14th, you can choose among different options in the My Trips section at https://t.co/pxuBw9jPIv
#AttentionPassengers: Get to know the international flights available to/from Chile until July 15th. Please check the details at https://t.co/YHkcdSBdOr https://t.co/VRlhR6ULir

entity.name: Pride Month
entity.description: Page for Global Pride Month for all years

data.text: Pride doesn’t know limits or borders, and we want everyone to feel free to express it. Let’s show you what we did on this Pride Day at different airports in the region. Because living in a world without labels makes us fly 🌈 #WeOnlyLabelLuggage https://t.co/uYFpaOKPbq

#Remember: The use of a mask is mandatory at all times during your journey, regardless of your vaccination status. Check out our policy on the use of Permitted Masks at: https://t.co/aogQ59ROYv https://t.co/GKl0qtpVpF

We believe in inclusion and that we must all respect each other despite our differences; that's why #WeOnlyLabelLuggage and never label people. Living in a world without labels makes us fly 🌈 https://t.co/mMCjVdasBe

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

data.text: If you are traveling from Miami you can get you PCR or Antigen Test with our testing partner Body K. You can book it online by entering https://t.co/JneGpLemUL and have a 10% off. https://t.co/Yz3210mfr7

We recommend that you keep up to date about the mandatory requirements for your next flight. To do it, you will find several options on our website that will give you the updated information that you need to know before your trip. Visit: https://t.co/x2aX1biwFo https://t.co/FCVgvkPcWC

In 2021, our most important journey will be towards #ANecessaryDestination. This is our promise to the world, to reduce our environmental impacts and collaborate with South America when it needs it most. Find out more at https://t.co/VmDB77DEoC https://t.co/BAJKOve5pO

#AttentionPassengers: Our flight offers from/to Chile in May are already available. You can learn about them at https://t.co/pxuBw9jPIv  If you need to manage or make changes to your flight, you can do it from the "My Trips" section. https://t.co/DumaukgrR2

entity.description: This entity includes all conversations about travel and vacation.

data.text: You can continue traveling with peace of mind because of our new partnership with @BodyK_Testing. If you need to take a PCR test to travel, learn all about this great news at https://t.co/z9VfKk9GZt https://t.co/1AVBUnqzdX

Stay updated and learn about our policy regarding the use and types of face masks required on all our flights as of March 1st here👇 Keep in mind that if your mask does not meet the standards, you will not be allowed to board. https://t.co/P2bSm8ksUS https://t.co/eUyFQtENty

Please go to https://t.co/6chgDVa84M check out all the details if you need to change your tickets without penalty. Remember that every time you make a change, if the new option's fare is higher than the original one, you will have to pay the fare difference. https://t.co/fS5oVzJOnQ

We want to simplify your trip! Follow these simple steps and obtain your baggage tag in just 15 seconds. You can now avoid crowds and have more time to enjoy for yourself. ✈  Innovating is #WhatMakesUsFly https://t.co/Xnte5D7Ldi https://t.co/iF3DuzceK1
Keep in mind that some states and/or counties in the United States have additional restrictions and recommendations. Please check them at https://t.co/OXUH9LR2xp
Note that the United States recently imposed entry restrictions for Brazilian citizens or foreigners who have been in Brazil. More information at https://t.co/OXUH9LR2xp
At the moment, the #CDC recommends that all international passengers comply with a quarantine (NOT mandatory). We recommend that you review these recommendations and additional requirements.
Passengers can also present a positive test result issued within 90 days, along with a proof of recovery. In both cases, a mandatory Health Declaration Form must be filled out.

data.text: #AttentionPassengers: All travelers flying to the United States must provide a negative antigen, PCR or NAAT test result taken 3 days prior to their flight. Continue reading 👇 https://t.co/IMfHwFnrJH

data.text: #AttentionPassengers: Due to adverse weather conditions, our operation between New York (JFK) and São Paulo (GRU) has suffered cancelations. Please review and manage your flight at https://t.co/V7OwAXFn6d

At LATAM, we are celebrating the 10th anniversary of our LATAM Fuel Efficiency program, which contributes to the reduction of fuel consumption and greenhouse gas emissions. On the World Day for Reducing CO2 Emissions, being more sustainable is #WhatMakesUsFly. https://t.co/OEoCWRGmz9
Besides, all passengers are recommended to go into a seven-day quarantine upon their arrival in the country. Find out more information at https://t.co/OXUH9LR2xp

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

data.text: #AttentionPassengers: As of January 26th, all passengers traveling to the United States must present a negative COVID-19 testing result, taken no more than 3 days before the flight date, and also an affidavit. https://t.co/eMmkgznOUl https://t.co/ctaS39fqyL

data.text: #AttentionPassengers: All passengers traveling to the United States must present a negative COVID-19 test (molecular or antigens) as of 26/01, taken no more than 3 days before the flight date, and also their health declaration form. More information at https://t.co/OXUH9LR2xp
#AttentionPassengers: Please remember that you must arrive at the airport 2,5 hrs in advance for domestic flights and 4 hrs for international flights due to health control procedures.

data.text: When you fly, your safety is our most important concern, so don’t forget to review your #LATAMChecklist which contains all the requirements you must meet for your trip to make sure that you are ready to travel. Find out more at https://t.co/OXUH9LR2xp https://t.co/cShfHqUqEr

#AttentionPassengers: The list of "country or risk zone" to enter Spain will be updated as of January 11. All passengers traveling from these countries must present a negative RT-PCR test, without exceptions. Find the list and requirements at https://t.co/OXUH9LR2xp

This new requirement is in addition to the mandatory 10-day quarantine from the time they enter the country or until they leave Chile (in case they stay for less than 10 days). We will continue to inform about new updates from the authorities.

#AttentionPassengers: From January 7th on, ALL passengers entering Chile (nationals, residents, and tourists) must present a negative RT-PCR test, performed a maximum of 72 hours before boarding the flight to Chile. More information at https://t.co/OXUH9LR2xp

#AttentionPassengers as of today, 30/12, providing a negative RT-PCR test result and Health Affidavit (DSV) will be mandatory to enter Brazil or transit through the country. Check out more information at https://t.co/OXUH9LR2xp

data.text: #UnitedStates: as of 28 December 2020, all the passengers traveling to the US from the UK must provide a negative result of the PCR or antigen test, taken no more than 72 h before the departure. Children under 2 years old are exempted. More information at https://t.co/tWDTcQMUfQ https://t.co/cAhWILAtsQ

data.text: Many people have told us that connecting with themselves or reliving experiences in nature makes them fly. We are delighted to know that there are so many reasons to travel and meet on board. Tell us, #WhatMakesYouFly? https://t.co/XISLKeJNng https://t.co/vPdDeEX7cA
You can't miss our last chapter of "60 Seconds" because Enrique Rosende will answer your questions about the PCR Test and other important travel requirements. https://t.co/Hav1UoWikl

data.text: We’re committed to South America, so our Solidarity Plane has been flying to support San Andrés and Providencia archipelago, delivering more than 70 tons of humanitarian aid because of hurricane IOTA. Join this cause. The Archipelago needs us! @ProArchipielago https://t.co/E7d1uTcCnP
